channel.title: Others on ShardingSphere
channel.description: Recent content in Others on ShardingSphere

item.title: FAQ
item.description: 1. How to debug when SQL can not be executed rightly in ShardingSphere? Answer: sql.show configuration is provided in ShardingSphere-Proxy and post-1.5.0 version of ShardingSphere-JDBC, enabling the context parsing, rewritten SQL and the routed data source printed to info log. sql.show configuration is off in default, and users can turn it on in configurations. A Tip: Property sql.show has changed to sql-show in version 5.x. 2. Why do some compiling errors appear?
